summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning amending Section 23.40.020 and Section 23.69.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code; adding the following Sections to the Seattle Municipal Code: Section 23.22.060, Section 23.44.015, Section 23.45.007, Section 23.46.024, Section 23.47.033, Section 23.49.021, and Section 23.50.050; and adding a new Chapter 23.52, Transportation Concurrency Project Review System; to implement the City's Comprehensive Plan.
